resources.string: Animações de modo de exibição de lista
Usar OmniSwitch para exibição de recentes
Certifiqua-te de que ativaste o OmniSwitch. Podes fazer isso usando o \"Definiçoes\" abaixo

Infelizmente, não somos feiticeiros! 

So, se você encontrar um bug com alguma dessas configurações, por favor abrir uma passagem no Jira ou entre em contato com o following.

1, um desenvolvedor de DU. Logcat ou Last_Kmsg
2. Used
3 kernel e Mods. Informação

If útil você deixar de relatar algo, não espere coisas para ser corrigido. Lembre-se, nós não somos assistentes para perdermos as coisas.
Mostrar o ícone da aplicaçao correspondente com o toast
O canto %1$s da barra de estado faz baixar o painel de definições rápidas
Abra o painel de definições rápidas quando as notificações presentes forem %1$s
Mostrar um controle deslizante brilho no painel de configurações rápidas
Mostrar um ícone de brilho para a esquerda do controle deslizante brilho para ajustar o auto-brilho
Mudar a exibição do ecrã recente
Menu de Energia no ecrã de Bloqueio
Mostrar Menu de Energia no ecrã de Bloqueio
Quantidade de fundo escuro de diálogo
Incluir opções no menu de reiniciar para a recuperação ou o bootloader
Bloquear wakelocks pode causar uma potencial instabilidade, travamento ou perda de dados
Para adicionar uma definição personalizada por aplicação para o estado expandido, desligue a opção \'Ativado para todas\'
Estilo da área de trabalho expandida
Escolher um estilo padrão para a área de trabalho expandida
Opções da área de trabalho expandida
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
This will hide all force close notifications
Double tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Change hosts file to disable ads
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device\nOverrides playback control
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Enable to animate the battery bar while charging
Alterar a fonte padrão do widget de relógio no ecrã de bloqueio
Selecione a fonte de relógio do ecrã de bloqueio
Pressão Longa no botão power equanto o ecrã estiver desligado para ligar a lanterna
O formato de 24 horas está activado
Dia da semana abreviado antes do relógio
Mostrar data personalizada antes do relógio
Precisa estar em formato de data, por exemplo: MM/DD/AA
Press on color below to apply
Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the arrows in the traffic indicators
Show basic weather in the extended statusbar area
Configure location for weather widget and other settings

Show basic weather in the extended statusbar area
Pick an icon for displaying the weather condition
Disables quick settings in the keyguard for a secure lock only

Search bar in recents menu is enabled

Display the number of pending notifications
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device

Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your SMS notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed

Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area
Enable/Disable action for the heads up button in the expanded statusbar area
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Two main tiles on the first row
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Open lockscreen directly to pin/pattern/password when there are %1$s notifications present
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Don\'t show heads up in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Post all notification from these applications to heads up

Enables the statusbar clock in the keyguard on the left side

For better visibility on bright images
Show charging current rate on lock screen
Show an editor window after taking a screenshot in order to do some operations like cropping, saving or sharing
Always use the cropped image inside the cropping area, even if the apply button hasn\'t been pressed
After selecting a target from below, swipe vertically with 3 fingers in a single motion from top to bottom to trigger the action you selected.
Enable advanced settings for location in quick settings
